name: Midas mHYPER
description: mHYPER is a tokenised certificate issued by Midas and intended to reference the performance of selected market-neutral, stablecoin-focused strategies deployed across on-chain markets and ecosystems. The strategy is monitored by Hyperithm, a digital asset manager based in Tokyo and Seoul, acting as the appointed Risk Manager. mHYPER is designed to provide on-chain access to diversified DeFi opportunities while maintaining a market-neutral investment profile.
